document_data.mainbody:
Snuggleguts was a kitten gifted to Imraea by the thief Torm in the .
The kitten was silver and black, with glistening black eyes.
In early Flamerule of the , Torm gifted Snuggleguts, then a kitten, to a young kid named Imraea, alongside nine gold pieces and instructions to find it a good name, for Snuggleguts was only its kitten name.
